column4: Can anyone help me with a wuodlibet plugin?  I can't find the /.quodlibet/plugins folder..
Anyone use quodlibet?
Guys, I am supposed to put a file in ~/.quodlibet/plugins.. where is that?
~ is the same as /home/your_username/ in general
where are you installing this from?
what command did you use?
why are you not using apt-get
there is no apt-get for that?
there is if you enable multiverse
please don't paste here
did you read the link ubotu gave you?
http://wiki.ubuntu.com/AddingRepositoriesHowto <-- this one?
no not that one :P
will it help me get dependencies???
yes, it will make it real easy for you
just install what ever the top level package is xmame-x or something I think
thanks, you like games? I made a linux game!! :D
what kind?
its a 2d game, you shoot missiles and ships
sounds cool, you should package it and submit it to get put in ubuntu's universe
I dont know how :S
only if you are interested
